name: CreateChangeTask
description:
Create a task on a change request in Freshservice.

This tool creates a new task on a specified change request within Freshservice. It should be called when you need to add tasks to an ongoing change request to track specific actions or activities.

parameters.name: change_request_id
parameters.description: ID of the change request to add a task to. It should be an integer.

value_schema.description: ID of change request for which tasks are to be retrieved

parameters.name: task_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details of the task to be created, including the creator's ID, assignee's ID, task status, and more.

created_by.description: Unique ID of the user who created the task

agent_id.description: Id of the agent to whom the task is assigned

parent_id.description: Unique ID of the parent entity to which the task belongs

parent_type.description: Type of the parent entity - [Ticket, Problem, Change, Release, Project]

notify_before.description: Time in seconds before which notification is sent prior to due date

created_at.description: Timestamp at which the task was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which the task was updated

closed_at.description: Timestamp at which the task was closed

group_id.description: Unique ID of the group to which the task is assigned

start_date.description: Timestamp at which the task is started

value_schema.description: detailss of task to be created
